RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: SelectionToBPM
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Script converts length of selection into BPM value. Select full length of beat in sample and press value button in the tool. Detected tempo may be sent to Renoise by "Set song BPM" button. x2 and :2 are two buttons for tempo division adjustment. Also tempo of sample may be adjusted to tempo of the song.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Laffik
